projects.title: -V2 iMonitor (Web-App)
projects.subtitle: #TAILWINDCSS #CSS #HTML #JAVASCRIPT #NODE.JS #REACT #VITE
projects.discrp: A monitoring and management system with built in messaging system for OJT student in STI Santa Maria College, This iMonitor is V2 of the web application it improves the overall layout of the web application but if you want to check out the first iMonitor here's the Repo Link: https://github.com/SeekerO/iMonitorDev

feature.title: Monitoring
feature.disc: Professor can see the progress of each individual student and in the same time the personal infromation that is needed.

feature.title: File Management
feature.disc: Student can upload file in the announcement where in the professor will receive it in it's end.

feature.title: Real-Time Messaging System
feature.disc: Student and Professor can communicate through the system will real-time messagin.

feature.title: Attendance System
feature.disc: The student can time in and time out that will be sent to end of the professor.

feature.title: 3 User Level
feature.disc: iMonitor has a 3 user level Professor, Admin and Student.
